Value<Cell>
public class CellHigher
extends Cell

Implements a higher dimensional cell.

Author:
Henry Adams, Atanas Atanasov

run

public void run(Density density,
                ParametersHigher p,
                boolean verbose,
                java.io.PrintWriter pointWriter,
                java.io.PrintWriter forceWriter)
Runs the cell. If the cell converges, the density value is then calculated. If not, then points is set to null.

Parameters:
density - density estimator
p - trial parameters
verbose - if true, prints trial to screen
pointWriter - writes the point locations
forceWriter - writes the forces

buildWeb

public static org.jgrapht.UndirectedGraph<CellHigherNode,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> buildWeb(BoundaryLoop loop,
                                                                                                 int angularSize,
                                                                                                 int radialSize,
                                                                                                 VectorDouble center,
                                                                                                 boolean placeCenter)
Builds a web-shaped graph.

Parameters:
loop - boundary loop
angularSize - number of points around the boundary
radialSize - number of rings in the web
center - location of the center of the web
placeCenter - if true, the center is included in the web
Returns:
web-shaped graph

buildSplineWeb

public static org.jgrapht.UndirectedGraph<CellHigherNode,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> buildSplineWeb(BoundaryLoop loop,
                                                                                                       int angularSize,
                                                                                                       int radialSize,
                                                                                                       VectorDouble center,
                                                                                                       boolean placeCenter,
                                                                                                       double lambda,
                                                                                                       double boundaryScale,
                                                                                                       double centerScale)
Builds a web-shaped graph. Cubic spline interpolation is used so that the web lies near the tangent space of the center.

Parameters:
loop - boundary loop
angularSize - number of points around the boundary
radialSize - number of rings in the web
center - location of the center of the web
placeCenter - if true, the center is included in the web
lambda -
boundaryScale - scales the spline velocity at the boundary
centerScale - scales the spline velocity at the center
Returns:
web-shaped graph

spline

public static VectorDouble spline(double t,
                                  VectorDouble a,
                                  VectorDouble b,
                                  VectorDouble da,
                                  VectorDouble db)
Performs cubic spline interpolation.

Parameters:
t - how far to move from the first endpoint towards the second
a - first endpoint
b - second endpoint
da - first velocity
db - second velocity
Returns:
the point
